experiment_name: A Photoenzymatic Strategy for Radical-Mediated Stereoselective Hydroalkylation with Diazo Compounds
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:room temperature;    reaction_ph:8.0;    reaction_other_conditions:OYE1 (0.16 mM, 2%), NADP+ (0.5 μmol), GDH (0.1 mg, 3 U), glucose (80 µmol), solvent (900 µL Tris buffer, 100 µL CH3CN), 12 h irradiation by 100 W Blue LEDs, N2 atmosphere;    reaction_substrate_concentration:1a: 16 mM;     2a: 8 mM
